Articles.Content:
Hello guys.

Recently we sent a 'Kerbal Space Program, store openning' e-mail to all of our donators. This e-mail contains the username and password that you will need to login in the new Pre-Order / Donation System that will be up this week.

If you\'ve already donated or pre-ordered KSP with the previous system and you did not receive this e-mail, please let us know.

Cheers.
Will people still be able to pre order after thisÃ‰
i had to....

Will people still be able to pre order after thisÃ‰

Yes. People will still be able to pre-order/donate KSP.

I hope there is an alternative to using PayPal. I\'m dying to have Squad take my money, not PayPal.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
if theres not,i will be stuck to using the demo version until there is.... :\'(

I hope there is an alternative to using PayPal. I\'m dying to have Squad take my money, not PayPal.

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Yeah, I am going to have to agree with skunky on this one. Although I have never personally had any issues with PayPal I know of people that have. Every single one of them were not able to recover their money during the dispute. PayPal isn\'t as good as it used to be IMO. But congratz to the team for overcoming a major hurdle. Good news
how should i let you know i didn\'t receive the mail?

how should i let you know i didn\'t receive the mail?

You just have.
Please include PaySafeCards if possible. I\'m going to preorder as soon as I can, KSP is awesome.
I too have yet to receive such an email.

I haven\'t received the email either.

Cheers

I\'ve received the e-mail xD

Can\'t wait for the story to open so I can get the download

On the subject; when will the store open? =]
W00t! Pre ordered like a boss!
i pre-ordered and received no email

I went ahead and reset my Store password since the original one didn\'t seem to be any of the passwords I\'d normally use. Is there a way I can change the new one, as from what I can tell there isn\'t any profile page in which I can change it with.
No store opening email for me...

I went ahead and reset my Store password since the original one didn\'t seem to be any of the passwords I\'d normally use. Is there a way I can change the new one, as from what I can tell there isn\'t any profile page in which I can change it with.

I would also like an option to choose my password. I\'m distinctly unhappy about having passwords which could be linked to my financial details being sent in plain text via e-mail.
i havn\'t got any e-mail either

I need emails switched.

aLeXmOrA, I sent you a PM explaining my problems. If any further explanation is needed, I will.
OK, just checked email accounts that could have got it (the one used to pay and the forum one), but I can\'t find the email.

I pre ordered using the old system, but I don\'t think I got any emails about this new store, but still have the emails for order, just not the email about the new store or any username / password, unless the forum account and password is for the store?
Didn\'t get the email.
Sorry guys no email for me either. 99% sure I still have the donation receipt though.

Didn\'t get the email.

Did you check your dad\'s email? Cause you PM that the email registered in the preorder system is your dad\'s one.

I\'m pretty sure there it is. If not, let me know.

Cheers.
